column5: its early august right now, anyone out there for salmon fishing? can't wait to start hitting the port hope area for salmon..... please let me know if you have already gone or is going! thanks.

Odds are noone will give an honest answer  We have caught bows browns and chinnys off various piers since last week.  It all depends on the wind this early. North wind over 15clicks for 3 days means get yer arse to the pier lol
You won't know until you try.
